audioText: Conformément aux prédictions du psychologue, sa motivation tombait chaque fois qu'il échouait à ses examens.
question: According to the psychologist's predictions, when did his motivation fall?
options: Every time he failed his exams
When he received criticism from his teachers
After spending too many hours studying alone
During periods of intense academic pressure
explanation: The correct answer is 'Every time he failed his exams'. The text states 'Conformément aux prédictions du psychologue, sa motivation tombait chaque fois qu'il échouait à ses examens' - According to the psychologist's predictions, his motivation fell every time he failed his exams. 'Tombait' is the imperfect form of 'tomber' (to fall), and 'conformément' means 'in accordance with'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - academic motivation context
